extensionDescription.message: A secure, encrypted tunnel to the web to protect yourself everywhere you use Firefox.

viewExemptTab.message: This tab is not protected by the Private Network proxy service. Your location is visible to ad trackers and websites you visit in this tab.

toastLastPassAvailable.message: You have 1 new Firefox Private Network pass!

toastPassesAvailable.message: You have $number$ new Firefox Private Network passes!

toastLastPassExpired.message: You've used all your free passes for this month.

toastPassExpired.message: Pass expired. Firefox Private Network is off.

toastWarning.message: Firefox Private Network needs your attention!

toastTabExempt.message: Firefox Private Network is temporarily disabled.

toastReminderAutoStartOFF.message: 5 minutes left. Firefox Private Network will turn off when this pass expires.

toastReminderAutoStartON.message: 5 minutes left. Next pass auto-starts after this one expires.

toastReminderAutoStartONNoPasses.message: 5 minutes left. Firefox Private Network will turn off when this pass expires.

viewAuthFailure.message: Sign in failed. To try again, sign in to your Firefox account or create one.

viewGeoFailure.message: At this time, Firefox Private Network is not available in your region. You must be in the United States to complete the setup process.

viewLoading.message: Establishing connection to Firefox Private Network. This should take just a few more moments.

viewLoginMessage.message: To start using Private Network, sign in to your Firefox account or create one.

viewMainActive.message: Your connection is secure, and your location is hidden from websites and trackers, making it tougher for those annoying targeted ads to follow you around online.

viewMainInactive.message: Private Network is not protecting your Firefox connection. Websites, ad trackers, and your internet service provider may be able to see your online activity.

viewMainInactiveWithoutPasses.message: You’ll receive 12 new passes at the beginning of next month. For unlimited protection, join the waitlist to upgrade to the full-device VPN.

viewMainActiveSubPassAutoStartON.message: Passes expire after one hour and cannot be paused or stopped. A new pass will automatically start after this one expires. Turn off auto-start in

viewMainActiveSubPassAutoStartOFF.message: Passes expire after one hour and cannot be paused or stopped. To have your next pass start after this one expires, turn on auto-start in

viewMainInactiveSubPassAutoStartON.message: Passes expire after one hour and cannot be paused or stopped. New passes start automatically. Turn off auto-start in

viewMainInactiveSubPassAutoStartOFF.message: Passes expire after one hour and cannot be paused or stopped. To automatically start the next pass after one expires, go to

viewMainSubPassLeft.message: Turn on Firefox Private Network to use a pass. This adds another layer of protection to your Firefox browsing and keeps your real location hidden.

viewOffline.message: You are offline. Check your network connection and try again.

viewOtherInUse.message: You cannot use Firefox Private Network because you are using a custom proxy setting.

viewMainProxyError.message: Firefox Private Network encountered an unknown issue. Try turning it off, then on again.

viewSettings-autorenewSub.message: Automatically start next pass after one expires.

viewSettings-reminderSub.message: Send notification 5 minutes before a pass expires.

loadingError.message: Connection timeout, check your internet connection.
